
Land-DA_update Documentation
============================================

`land-DA_update <https://github.com/noaa-psd/land-DA_update>`_ is comprised of scripts  to perfrom the snow DA, to assimilate GHCN station snow depth and IMS snow cover obs, using the JEDI LETKF. For the noahMP land surface model.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::
    usage
    increment
